parameters.name: --intent-to-add

parameters.name: --all
parameters.tooltip: add changes from all tracked and untracked files

parameters.name: --ignore-removal

parameters.name: --refresh
parameters.tooltip: don't add, only refresh the index

parameters.name: --ignore-errors
parameters.tooltip: just skip files which cannot be added because of errors

parameters.name: --ignore-missing
parameters.tooltip: check if - even missing - files are ignored in dry run

parameters.name: --3way
parameters.tooltip: allow fall back on 3way merging if needed

parameters.name: --signoff

parameters.name: --no-keep-cr
parameters.tooltip: do not pass --keep-cr flag to git-mailsplit independent of am.keepcr

parameters.name: --scissors
parameters.tooltip: strip everything before a scissors line

parameters.name: --resolvemsg

parameters.name: --continue
parameters.tooltip: continue applying patches after resolving a conflict

parameters.name: --abort
parameters.tooltip: restore the original branch and abort the patching operation.

parameters.name: --ignore-date
parameters.tooltip: use current timestamp for author date

parameters.name: --rerere-autoupdate
parameters.tooltip: update the index with reused conflict resolution if possible

parameters.name: --exclude

parameters.name: --include
parameters.tooltip: apply changes matching the given path

parameters.name: -p
parameters.tooltip: remove <num> leading slashes from traditional diff paths

parameters.name: --no-add
parameters.tooltip: ignore additions made by the patch

parameters.name: --stat
parameters.tooltip: instead of applying the patch, output diffstat for the input

parameters.name: --numstat

parameters.name: --summary
parameters.tooltip: instead of applying the patch, output a summary for the input

parameters.name: --check
parameters.tooltip: instead of applying the patch, see if the patch is applicable

parameters.name: --index
parameters.tooltip: make sure the patch is applicable to the current index

parameters.name: --cached
parameters.tooltip: apply a patch without touching the working tree

parameters.name: --unsafe-paths
parameters.tooltip: accept a patch that touches outside the working area

parameters.name: --3way
parameters.tooltip: attempt three-way merge if a patch does not apply

parameters.name: -z
parameters.tooltip: paths are separated with NUL character

parameters.name: -C

parameters.name: --whitespace
parameters.tooltip: detect new or modified lines that have whitespace errors

parameters.name: --ignore-space-change

parameters.name: --ignore-whitespace
parameters.tooltip: ignore changes in whitespace when finding context

parameters.name: --unidiff-zero
parameters.tooltip: don't expect at least one line of context

parameters.name: --reject

parameters.name: --inaccurate-eof
parameters.tooltip: tolerate incorrectly detected missing new-line at the end of file

parameters.name: --recount

parameters.name: --prefix

parameters.name: --output

parameters.tooltip: retrieve the archive from remote repository <repo>

parameters.name: --exec

parameters.name: --no-checkout

parameters.tooltip: Do not treat root commits as boundaries (Default: off)

parameters.name: --score-debug

parameters.name: --minimal

parameters.tooltip: terminate input and output records by a NUL character
